terminal_content: üßëüèª‚Äçüíª My name is David and I have been working as a Full Stack Web Developer for more than 4 years.

üöÄ I started programming after finishing high school, as I always knew this field was for me. Since then, I have been immersed in a constant process of learning and improvement, which has led me to face new challenges every day that have shaped the professional I consider myself to be today.

üîù Although a large part of my time is dedicated to my daily work, I always find space to create something new in my free time. I am very proud of what I have achieved so far, but what really excites me are the opportunities that the future holds. I am eager to expand this portfolio with more projects and successes!
üòÄ Thank you very much for visiting my website and for being part of my journey of growth and professional development!

Spotify Clone.description: This project focuses on faithfully replicating the Spotify web interface, providing users with the ability to play music, search, and explore playlists. With an emphasis on visual and functional fidelity, this clone has allowed me to explore and develop both new features and familiar ones

My daily Job.description: While not a standalone project, I want to highlight my daily work, as it's where I dedicate most of my time and effort as a developer. I'm part of a team building web-based solutions focused on KYC (Know Your Customer) processes within the financial sector. Due to confidentiality agreements, I'm unable to share specific project details, but my contributions span multiple products with diverse technical requirements. I've worked across both frontend and backend, using various technologies and actively contributing to a range of complex, compliance-driven projects

work_experience_list.title: Full Stack Web Developer at Simple KYC
work_experience_list.description: This is my current job where I have learned a wide range of web development skills and technologies.
details: Development and maintenance of web applications for leading banking clients in Australia primarily using Laravel and PHP.
Front-end development with Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, and other technologies such as jQuery or JavaScript for an optimal user experience.
Management of MySQL and PostgreSQL databases.
Creation of REST APIs and process automation.
Utilization of agile methodologies and scrum development.
Collaboration in teams using Git for version control.
Proactive resolution of incidents and technical issues.
